articles.title: Business Roundup: A new Five Below store opens Friday in Poway
articles.author: Julie Gallant
articles.summary: Five Below opened a new store in Poway on May 9, 2025, offering items priced mostly between $1 and $5, including snacks, beauty supplies, tech devices, and home decor. Genie Car Wash also opened a new self-serve location in Poway on April 21, 2025, providing three levels of wash options and monthly memberships.

articles.title: Popular appliance sold at Costco recalled for dangerous glitch
articles.author: Dana Sullivan Kilroy
articles.summary: SharkNinja has issued a recall for its Ninja-brand Foodi OP300-series Pressure Cookers/Tender Crisp Air Fryers due to a defect where the pressure-cooking lids can be opened while the cooker is operational. Over 1.8 million units sold between January 2019 and March 2025 are affected, and consumers are urged to stop using the pressure-cooking function immediately and request a free replacement lid.

articles.title: 42 Gadgets, Gizmos, And Contraptions That Will Make You Go 'Ooooh' When You Find Out They Exist
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article features the introduction of various new products, including Oxo's compact Brew Rapid Brewer for fast cold brew, Ninja's portable Crispi Air Fryer system for convenient cooking, and a new mini Kindle with enhanced portability. Additionally, Our Place has launched the Splendor Blender, and SnapPower has introduced GuideLight, an outlet light, enhancing their product offerings.

articles.title: Meta Quest+ Gets A Horizon+ Rebrand
articles.author: Andrew Williams
articles.summary: Meta has rebranded its Meta Quest+ subscription service to Horizon+ in preparation for opening its VR ecosystem to other hardware makers. The Horizon+ subscription offers access to two VR games each month and a wider library of VR titles, costing $7.99 monthly or $59.99 annually.

articles.title: Aldi Shoppers Say These "Dupes" Are Way, Wayyy Better Than The Originals (And Now I Want To Try Them All)
articles.author: Sydney Martin
articles.summary: Aldi receives positive feedback on several of its products, often preferred over name-brand alternatives. Noteworthy mentions include Cinnamon Crunch Squares cereal, aged sharp white cheddar, Knock Your Sprouts Off sprouted-grain bread, Aldi Pop-Tarts, Moser Roth dark chocolate, Klancy Kettle Salt and Vinegar Chips, and Stackerz. The breakfast bars, Fiber Now Bars, Prosecco and Moscato, and Hummus are also well-regarded.

articles.title: 22 Of The Best Aldi Dupes Shoppers Swear By
articles.author: Sydney Martin
articles.summary: Aldi's knockoff products are gaining popularity, with customers preferring them over name brands in categories like cereal (Cinnamon Crunch Squares), cheese (aged sharp white cheddar), and snacks (Stackerz). Customers also highlight Aldi's Prosecco and Moscato as delicious and their fruit snacks were recently updated in big blue box with firmer texture and better flavor.

articles.title: Samsung introduces Neo QLED TV line-up - Here are the price & features
articles.author: Dhruv Mohan
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its 2025 AI TV lineup, featuring Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, and The Frame TVs. These TVs incorporate the NQ4 AI Gen3 Processor and offer features like the Cloud Gaming Service and localized Smart Experiences. Pre-orders start May 7, 2025, with benefits including free soundbars and cashback.

articles.title: Get the newest Kindle in time for Mother's Day and save 20% if you shop now
articles.author: Angela Tricarico
articles.summary: Amazon's Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition is currently 20% off, matching its all-time low price. The Kindle Colorsoft features a color eInk screen, matte anti-glare screen, wireless charging, weeks of battery life, and adjustable brightness settings.

articles.title: MetaLiveX: How AI Is Becoming the 'Dream Engine' of the Entertainment Industry
articles.author: Jade Morgan
articles.summary: MetaLiveX, an AI-powered platform, is being launched to transform the entertainment industry. The platform features real-time scene generation, intelligent content scheduling, and XR immersive experiences, allowing viewers to interact with live streams by voting and virtually trying on products. MetaLiveX aims to disrupt the traditional content delivery model.

articles.title: Pop-Tarts launches 6 new frozen desserts! What are they and when will they be available?
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Pop-Tarts has launched six new frozen desserts, including three varieties of ice cream sandwiches (Frosted Brown Sugar Cinnamon, Frosted Strawberry, Frosted Chocolate Fudge) and three varieties of ice cream pints (Frosted Brown Sugar Cinnamon, Frosted Strawberry, Frosted S'Mores). The new Pop-Tarts frozen desserts are already available in local grocery stores.

articles.title: Matte lip balm is back in style with NYX Cosmetics‘ latest summer launch
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: NYX Cosmetics launched the Smushy Matte Lip Balm, a nourishing formula with a blurred matte finish, available in 12 bright shades for $9. The balm's formula uses mochi rice powder and sugar ceramides for a lightweight feel, and it will be available at Ulta Beauty in stores and online starting May 18.

articles.title: Reddit Adds Simplified Business Profile Creation to Reddit Pro
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Reddit is introducing new AI-powered features to its Reddit Pro suite of business tools, including an AI-powered business summary element that suggests a description for a company based on its URL. Brands can now also re-share relevant community posts and comments on their profiles to highlight relevant discussion. Reddit Pro is available for free to eligible businesses in English-speaking countries where Reddit operates.

articles.title: This is the weirdest Windows tablet you'll see today: a tiny battery, but also Windows 11 Pro and eight - yes 8, ports
articles.author: Efosa Udinmwen
articles.summary: SZBOX has launched the SZBOX S9, a rugged tablet that doubles as a mini PC, now available on Amazon for $341. This device features a 7-inch touchscreen, Intel N200 processor, 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM, up to 1TB of SSD storage, and a variety of connectivity options, designed for utility, industrial, and mobile computing scenarios.

articles.title: Dyson's Target-exclusive V8 Origin Cordless Stick Vacuum is on sale for a huge 30% off
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Target is offering the Dyson V8 Origin Cordless Stick Vacuum for a discounted price of $300, down from $430. This model, available exclusively at Target, features strong suction, a de-tangling Motorbar cleaner head, and up to 40 minutes of battery life, with 2 year warranty and customer support from Dyson.

articles.title: Samsung confirms Galaxy S25 Edge launch for May 13: Ultra-Thin, 200MP beast incoming
articles.author: Hassan Naqvi
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge on May 13, featuring a 200MP camera and Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The smartphone, expected to be ultra-slim, may have a limited initial release, prioritizing South Korea and China, with a potential starting price around $1,200.

articles.title: Nextiva Launches Customer Experience Day – A New Global Holiday Celebrating the Power of Putting Customers First in Business
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nextiva, a unified customer experience management company, has established Customer Experience Day, a new annual international observance held every May 15th. This initiative recognizes people and businesses delivering exceptional customer experiences. The aim is to highlight empathy, innovation, and human connection in business.

articles.title: New Circle to Search Look! Google Testing Fresh Layouts
articles.author: Tyler Lee
articles.summary: Google is currently testing new layouts for its Circle to Search feature, a tool that allows users to find information on their smartphone screen. One layout replaces the long search bar with a smaller rectangular box, while the other splits the search bar into two rows and houses 'Song search' and 'Translate' buttons in the bottom row. These tests may hint at the Material Design 3 Expressive unveiling at I/O 2025.

articles.title: Nippon Paint (Coatings) Philippines, Inc. unveils new Weatherbond Quartz Series
articles.author: Share:
articles.summary: Nippon Paint Philippines has launched the Weatherbond Quartz series, a new exterior wall paint offering advanced protection against weather elements, UV rays, and dirt. The Weatherbond Quartz series is now available at selected Modern Trade stores, with prices starting at PhP 442.00 for 1L.

articles.title: Don't ruin your Galaxy phone with a half-baked beta update
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly testing Android 16/One UI 8, with a potential early public beta launch as early as June. The company might showcase One UI 8 when it announces the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7. The upcoming One UI version will continue Samsung's trend of meaningfully changing Android to add value to its products.

articles.title: Louisiana-Based Startup Launches Touchless, At-Home Car Wash Service Amid Growing Industry Demand
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: SayNoMore has introduced two new car wash service packages: the Super Mobile Car Wash Showroom Killer Package and the Clean & Fresh Reset Package. This demonstrates their commitment to providing convenient and effective car care services.

articles.title: ChatGPT takes swipe at rival Google with surprising new ‘shopping' feature – and won't get any ads
articles.author: Maya Lanzone
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT has introduced updates to enhance the shopping experience, providing users with improved product results, visual details, pricing, and direct purchase links. These changes, available to free, Plus, and Pro users, aim to simplify product search, comparison, and purchase, utilizing independently chosen product results from websites that have not opted out of OpenAI's web crawler.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Tri-Fold Prototype with Next-Gen Battery Technology
articles.author: Hans India Digital
articles.summary: Samsung is developing a tri-fold smartphone prototype with new battery technology to improve battery life and durability. The prototype features three screens and is designed to maximize power density while minimizing size. The advanced battery is engineered to withstand the stresses of folding and unfolding, highlighting Samsung's commitment to foldable technology innovation.

articles.title: Windows 11 is about to make app downloads easier, but there's a risk
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new feature in Windows 11 that enables users to download apps from the Microsoft Store directly through Windows Search. This update adds a 'Get' button within the search results, allowing for immediate app installation without navigating to the Microsoft Store.

articles.title: McDonald's launches new menu across 322 restaurants exclusively in the north
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched a new 'Breakfast Saver Menu' in 322 restaurants across the north of England, including Greater Manchester. The menu features items like a Sausage Sandwich (£1.99) and Saver Bacon Roll (£2.19), along with other breakfast options.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Vision AI for Neo QLED, OLED, QLED and The Frame TVs, Bringing Intelligent, Immersive & Adaptive Screens to Indian Consumers
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 models of Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, QLED TVs, and The Frame lineup in India, introducing Samsung Vision AI technology. The new AI-powered TVs feature enhanced picture and sound optimization, personalized content discovery, and multi-device connectivity. Pre-orders started from May 7, 2025, and include benefits such as free soundbars and cashback offers.

articles.title: Eyekandy Launches the 'Sales Ambassador™' - The World's First Digital Human Super Salesperson For Every Point of Purchase
articles.author: Eye Kandy
articles.summary: Eyekandy, a global leader in immersive commerce, introduced Sales Ambassador™, a new AI digital human. The Sales Ambassador™ aims to revolutionize how brands and retailers engage, convert, and retain shoppers across all shopping channels.

articles.title: From snail slime to salmon sperm: the K-beauty boom hits UK high streets
articles.author: Joanna Partridge
articles.summary: LG Household & Health Care (LG H&H) launched its K-beauty brand Belif in the UK at the start of May, initially at online retailers and two London branches of retailer GlamTouch. Moida launched its first UK store in west London's Westfield shopping centre in December and opened its second in the capital this month. Moida is also planning expansion across the UK.

articles.title: Dyson V12 Detect Slim Absolute review: a small home superhero
articles.author: Aaron Dowler
articles.summary: Dyson launched the V12 Detect Slim, a lightweight cordless vacuum featuring laser dust detection and an LCD display. The V12 is designed for smaller homes, offering powerful suction and versatile attachments, including a motorized cleaner head, crevice tool, and hair screw tool for pet hair and upholstery. It is currently on sale for £379.99 on Dyson's site, with a complimentary Floor Dok worth £100.

articles.title: NIKON TOUR KICKS OFF IN CHICAGO, COMING SOON TO VARIOUS U.S. CITIES
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Nikon is launching the Nikon Tour, a series of mobile and pop-up events across the U.S., to promote and provide hands-on experience with the new Nikon Z5II and Z50II mirrorless cameras. The tour will feature workshops, photo walks, and product trials, starting in Chicago and continuing to other cities like Los Angeles, San Diego, Phoenix, and Houston.

articles.title: The year of the robot
articles.author: Stephen McBride
articles.summary: Waymo and Tesla are introducing robotaxis, while Amazon and Zipline are launching drone delivery services. IKEA is employing autonomous drones for warehouse automation, and Boston Dynamics' robodog is used in Nestle factories. Figure and Clone Robotics are launching humanoid robots and Johns Hopkins University and Stanford have created surgical robots.

articles.title: Heinz scraps popular condiment with shoppers baffled by 'strange' decision
articles.author: Schannell Kanyora
articles.summary: Heinz has launched a new 'Fish and Chips Sauce' in the UK, replacing its existing Tartare Sauce. This new sauce, developed in collaboration with TikTok star Destiny Harold, is promoted as a creamier, herb-forward alternative to traditional tartare sauce, containing gherkins, onions, and herbs.

articles.title: 2025 QNED Evo TV Lineup With Enhanced Visuals And True Wireless Launched
articles.author: Soko Directory Team
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its 2025 QNED evo TV lineup, which features Mini LED technology, an α AI processor, and the webOS platform. The lineup includes the QNED9M model that can transmit audio and video wirelessly via True Wireless technology, and will be available starting in May in Korea, the U.S., and European countries.

articles.title: NGA Launches Public Safety Product Advisory Council to Guide Public Safety Technology Innovation
articles.author: NGA
articles.summary: NGA launched its Public Safety Product Advisory Council on May 8, 2025. This group will align the company's NG911 technology roadmap with the evolving needs of public safety agencies. The council's formation implies future development and launch of new or updated NG911 related products or services.

articles.title: What 25 years in travel tech taught me about the future of personalization
articles.author: Francis Hellyer
articles.summary: Tickadoo has launched new memberships that leverage agentic AI to enhance personalization. This new service aims to anticipate user needs by analyzing past choices, reading between the lines to suggest experiences users may not have explicitly requested. The goal is to make travel and entertainment more accessible, personal, and human.

articles.title: SS Innovations to Submit De Novo Application to the FDA for the SSi Mantra 3 Surgical Robotic ...
articles.author: SS Innovations
articles.summary: SS Innovations International plans to submit a De Novo Classification Request to the FDA in July 2025 for the SSi Mantra 3 surgical robotic system. FDA approval would allow SS Innovations to market the SSi Mantra 3 in the United States.

articles.title: Snackable Media, a Leading Multicultural Ad Network, Acquires AdGrid.io to Boost Programmatic Tech
articles.author: Snackable Media
articles.summary: Snackable Media acquired AdGrid to expand its offerings in digital advertising. The integration of AdGrid's platform will provide a full-stack solution for ad management and monetization. AdGrid's product suite will continue to operate under Snackable Media, with expansion plans into new verticals like CTV and Audio.

articles.title: The Best Blender
articles.summary: Vitamix offers the Personal Cup Adapter and a 48-ounce stainless steel blending pitcher as separate purchases for the Vitamix 5200. The Personal Cup Adapter includes two 20-ounce blending cups with lids and an adapter fitted with blades, performing similarly to standalone personal blenders. The 48-ounce stainless steel blending pitcher is a stain and odor-resistant alternative to the plastic jar that comes with the Vitamix 5200.

articles.title: TINECO INTRODUCES FLOOR ONE S7 STRETCH ULTRA: SMART FLOOR CLEANING WITH UNMATCHED FLEXIBILITY
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Tineco has launched the FLOOR ONE S7 Stretch Ultra, a new smart floor washer. The new model offers extended runtime, upgraded anti-tangle technology, and an optimized self-cleaning system. It is available on the Tineco online store and Amazon for $699.

articles.title: Costco fans slam new item as ‘tasteless' and ‘very bland' as they vow not to repurchase
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Good Foods launched its new Chicken Taco Dip, a low-sodium dip made with blended chicken, corn, cheese, and jalapenos, at Costco. Customer reviews are mixed, with some finding the dip bland despite attempts to enhance its flavor, while others enjoy it.

articles.title: Mistral Medium 3 multimodal AI model unveiled with advanced capabilities
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Mistral AI has launched Mistral Medium 3, a new multimodal AI model aimed at enterprise users. The model is available via cloud services and API access with pricing at $0.4 per million input tokens and $2 per million output tokens. Internal testing suggests Mistral Medium 3 outperforms models like Llama 4 Maverick, GPT-4o, and Claude 3.7 Sonnet.

articles.title: I put four robot lawnmowers through a brutal backyard battle — and only one person got injured
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: The article reviews several robot lawnmowers: Segway Navimow i110, Mammotion Luba 2 AWD, Dreame A1, and Husqvarna Automower 430X, testing their navigation, reliability, and cutting performance. New models from Husqvarna (iQ Series), Ecovacs (GOAT 3000), Eufy (Robot Lawn Mower E15 and E18), and Segway (Navimow X3 series) are announced, promising improved navigation, obstacle avoidance, and mapping capabilities.

articles.title: I put four robot lawnmowers through a brutal backyard showdown — and only one person got injured
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Segway launched the new Navimow X3 series, starting at $2,299, with an advanced navigation system and obstacle avoidance. Husqvarna's new iQ Series, available for pre-order at $3,000, is designed for North American lawns, featuring improved terrain handling and navigation. Eufy introduced the Eufy Robot Lawn Mower E15 and E18, starting at $1,799.99, utilizing self-driving technology for obstacle avoidance and yard mapping.

articles.title: Orange 142 Unveils Essential Guide for Brand Visibility in the Generative AI Search Era
articles.author: Direct Digital Holdings
articles.summary: Direct Digital Holdings division has launched the "Best Practices Guide to Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)", a playbook for marketers in the era of AI search.  The guide assists brands in understanding and implementing Generative Engine Optimization strategies, helping them adapt to zero-click customer journeys and AI-driven search environments.

articles.title: Zaxbys Goes BIG with New Giant Quesadillas for a Limited-Time Only
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Zaxbys launched Giant Quesadillas on April 28, 2025. The Giant Quesadillas feature three hand-breaded Chicken Fingerz™ and Cheddar Jack cheese in two flavor combinations: Chicken Bacon Ranch and Chicken Fajita. The quesadillas are available at participating Zaxbys locations through July 6, 2025.

articles.title: I tried cordless vacuum that's on Amazon sale and that leaves my robot
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: Levoit's LVAC-300 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is reviewed, emphasizing its 99.9% dust pickup rate, 12,000 floor contacts per minute, and 100,000 RPM brushless motor, along with its anti-tangle brush and 5-layer HEPA filter. Amazon also offers price drops on Smoture Cordless Vacuum Cleaner and Dyson V11 Extra Cordless Vacuum.

articles.title: OWC Launches 'My OWC' App to Further Streamline Setup, Support, and Ownership Experience
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: OWC (Other World Computing) has launched the My OWC app on iOS. This mobile app is designed to streamline the customer experience, allowing users to set up and manage their OWC products, access support, and receive updates via push notifications.

articles.title: Samsung's 2025 Smart TV Series With Vision AI Gets 7 Years Of Updates: Price, Features
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 smart TV lineup in India, featuring Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, QLED, and The Frame models. The premium range is equipped with Vision AI technology and will receive 7 OS upgrades. Prices range from Rs 49,490 for the QLED range to Rs 2.72 Lakhs for the Neo QLED 8K TV.

articles.title: Samsung launches vision AI-powered TVs in India, redefining home entertainment with AI technology
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 TV lineup in India, featuring Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, QLED, and The Frame models with AI powers. The flagship Neo QLED 8K QN950F includes AI Upscaling Pro, Glare-Free technology, Auto HDR Remastering Pro, and Color Booster Pro. The new Samsung TVs also have Universal Gesture Control and Generative Wallpaper features.

articles.title: Thunderbit Launches Vertical AI Web Data Extraction Agent Built for Business Users
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Thunderbit launched its vertical AI agent, an AI-powered web data extraction platform, designed for business users for smarter, faster, and more accessible ways to extract structured data from the web. It is available as a Chrome Extension, and it focuses solely on web data extraction.

articles.title: Birdeye unveils the AI Vision for Hyperlocal Marketing
articles.author: Bird Eye
articles.summary: Birdeye introduces a new AI architecture. This architecture powers a Service as a Software model. This new model directly delivers business outcomes through autonomous and supervised AI agents and multi-layered LLMs.

articles.title: Jia He Presents an Exquisite Selection of Zongzi Rice Dumplings for the Dragon Boat Festival  May. 8, 2025 11:56
org: Jia He C h i n e s e Restaurant
articles.summary: Jia He Chinese Restaurant and Jia He Grand announced a new collection of handcrafted zongzi for the Dragon Boat Festival, available from May 1st to May 31st, 2025. The collection includes options like the Signature X.O. Roasted Meat Dumpling and Vegetarian Butterfly Blue Pea Flower Nonya Dumpling, along with exclusive combination sets.

articles.title: Zefr Announces Launch of Pre-Screen Brand Safety Solution for Google's Search Partner Network (SPN)
articles.author: Zefr Inc
articles.summary: Zefr launched its Pre-Screen Exclusion List Solution for Google's Search Partner Network (SPN). This offering allows advertisers to pre-screen and exclude domains, ensuring brand safety before ad impressions are served. The solution aligns campaigns with industry brand safety and suitability standards.

articles.title: Samsung Set to Unveil Galaxy S25 Edge Globally on May 13
articles.author: Biswaranjan Jena
articles.summary: Galaxy has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, the newest addition to the Galaxy S25 series. The Galaxy S25 Edge features mobile AI capabilities for enhanced photography, including a 200MP wide lens and smart lens powered by Galaxy AI.

articles.title: If You Want A Cool Upgrade, Try These 36 Smarter Versions Of Common Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products including Oxo's compact Brew Rapid Brewer, e.l.f's brand new Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, and Ninja's new portable Crispi Air Fryer system. Other products include Touchland Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer and a Bentgo stackable lunch container.

articles.title: Spring Refresh: Join Lifestyle Expert Jeannette Kaplun Shares Must-Haves
articles.summary: Lysol and ScotchBlue are promoting their products and services related to spring cleaning and home renovation. Lifestyle expert Jeannette Kaplun encourages viewers to visit Lysol.com and ScotchBlue.com for more information, suggesting potential new product features or offerings for the season.

articles.title: Kaltura Announces Financial Results for First Quarter 2025
articles.summary: Kaltura is focused on AI-infused hyper-personalized video experiences and offers an AI Video Experience Cloud, including platforms for content management and Gen AI-infused video-first products like Video Portals, LMS and CMS Video Extensions, Virtual Events and Webinars, Virtual Classrooms, and TV Streaming Applications. These new product developments aim to enhance customer and employee engagement.

articles.title: Is Samsung's triple-foldable just a dual-hinge Z Fold 7? New leak reveals
articles.summary: Samsung is speculated to launch its triple-foldable device, the Samsung Galaxy G Fold, potentially alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7. The Galaxy G Fold is rumored to feature a 9.9-inch display when unfolded and may include S Pen support. The device is expected to be in a premium price bracket, similar to Huawei's Mate XT.

articles.title: Dyna.Ai launches operations with Nigeria Dyna Day on 15 May
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Dyna.Ai is launching its AI-powered products and solutions in Nigeria, targeting the financial ecosystem. The launch will occur at the 'Nigeria Dyna Day' event on May 15, 2025, at Four Points by Sheraton Lagos. The event aims to introduce the AI suite to financial institutions, fintechs, and the local government in Nigeria.

articles.title: Next 'stunning' summer dress described as being 'perfect in every way'
articles.author: Ben Lyons
articles.summary: Next is offering the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress for £34 in various colors and sizes. The dress features a relaxed fit, cotton-blend material, textured pattern, adjustable straps, and machine-washable fabric. Additionally, River Island and New Look have introduced the Pink Broderie Midi Dress for £69 and the Red Gingham Bow Back Midi Dress for £33.99, respectively.

articles.title: Next 'stunning' summer dress described as being 'perfect in every way' - available in four colours
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next introduced the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress, priced at £34 and available in four colors and various sizes. River Island is offering the Pink Broderie Midi Dress for £69, and New Look features the Red Gingham Bow Back Midi Dress at £33.99.

articles.title: Samsung Sri Lanka Expands Bespoke AI Laundry Portfolio with New 12KG Front Load Washing Machines
articles.summary: Samsung Sri Lanka has launched its new 12KG Front Load Washing Machines, an extension of the Bespoke Laundry Series. The new washing machines feature Super Speed, AI Energy Mode, Ecobubble, and Hygiene Steam. The 12KG front load washing machines are available starting at Rs. 199,999 at Singhagiri, Singer, Damro and Softlogic outlets.

articles.title: Why It's a Good Thing That Smartphones Are Boring Now
articles.author: Ayush Jalan
articles.summary: The article discusses how modern smartphones, including models like the upcoming Galaxy S25 and Pixel 9, now offer standardized features and reliability.  It also notes that Google and Samsung now offer extended software support, with newer mid-range phones like the Galaxy A56 and the Pixel 9a supported for six and seven years, respectively, enhancing the overall user experience.

articles.title: Syncron Unveils Next-Gen Partner Network to Power the Future of Aftermarket Services
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syncron launched the Syncron Partner Network to enhance its global ecosystem and accelerate aftermarket operations for customers. The program introduces a structured framework to support various partner engagement models, providing customers with tailored expertise and solutions to maximize their Syncron SLM investments. It focuses on collaboration, innovation, and mutual success.

articles.title: At NewFronts, Snapchat Adds New Functionality To Its Sponsored Snaps
articles.author: Colin Kirkland
articles.summary: Snapchat launched new location-specific brand campaigns and AI campaign solutions. The company also introduced advertising updates for brands and creators. Furthermore, Snapchat announced a new in-person live music series.

articles.title: Nostalgic candy company from the 90s rolls out new ‘mystery' flavor – but you must look for the color
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Gushers has launched a new product: a bag of all-blue Gushers, fulfilling a long-standing request from fans. The all-blue pack contains a mix of the original sour blue raspberry flavor and a mystery flavor, which is now available in stores.

articles.title: Thanksweb Turns 9: Elevating Brands Since 2016
articles.summary: Thanksweb, initially focused on SEO, has expanded its service offerings. The company now provides Web Development, Social Media Marketing, Meta Ads & PPC, and Product Photography to cater to the evolving needs of its global clients.

articles.title: Aldi's £44 cordless cleaning gadget is BACK in stores this week – and it's £280 cheaper than popular Dyson version
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: ALDI has launched a Cordless Cyclonic Stick Vacuum for £45, featuring two suction levels, a washable dust container, and the ability to transform into a handheld vacuum. It is compared to the Dyson V8 Advanced Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, which offers more suction and a longer running time but is significantly more expensive.

articles.title: It's confirmed! Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge to be launched next week
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge later this month on May 13th. The Galaxy S25 Edge features a super-slim design, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 6.7-inch Quad HD+ super AMOLED screen, and a dual-camera module with a 200MP main camera. The phone will run Android 15-based One UI 7 OS and receive seven years of Android OS updates and software security patches.

articles.title: Mahindra To Unveil New Flexible Platform On August 15: Next-Gen Bolero Likely First In Line
articles.author: Times Drive Desk
articles.summary: Mahindra will unveil the New Flexible Architecture (NFA) platform on August 15, which will underpin multiple future vehicles, including the next-generation Bolero. The NFA platform supports both internal combustion engine (ICE) and electric vehicles, suggesting a possible all-electric Bolero variant. Mahindra plans to launch 12 new vehicles by 2030.

articles.title: If You Want To Feel Less Like A Hot Mess In 2025, These 25 Low-Effort Products Will Majorly Come In Handy
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced, including Clinique Almost Lipstick tinted lip balm, Wet & Forget shower cleaner, and Lumify eye drops. Additionally, the Eufy robot vacuum and Shark Tank-approved Souper Cubes freezer tray are presented as solutions to everyday problems, offering convenience and efficiency.

articles.title: White Stuff slashes 'incredibly comfy' £65 midi dress to £35 with a 'special feature'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: White Stuff has reduced the price of their 'Megan Midi Dress' to £35 from £65. The dress features a V-neck, short sleeves, and pockets, and comes in regular and petite sizes. It is made from organic cotton and available in multiple prints, including 'blue multi', 'navy multi', and 'blue print'.

articles.title: Next's 'stunning' £34 summer dress that's 'perfect in every way'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next has introduced the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress, retailing at £34, available in multiple colors and sizes. The dress is described as having a relaxed fit and is made from a comfortable cotton-blend material. Alternative options like River Island's Pink Broderie Midi Dress, New Look's Red Gingham Bow Back Midi Dress and Very's Vero Moda Woven Ankle Drop Hem Dress are also available.

articles.title: Nintendo expects Switch 1 to become its best-selling hardware ever this year, but fall just ...
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo anticipates selling 4.5 million more units of its original Switch. This projection occurs despite the upcoming launch of the Switch 2.

articles.title: Next's 'comfy' £34 dress shoppers 'can't wait to wear' on holiday
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next has introduced the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress, a cotton-blend dress with textured detailing, a rounded collar, and adjustable shoulder straps, retailing at £34. The dress is available in white, navy, lilac, or black and in sizes six through 22 and has received overwhelmingly positive online reviews from Next customers.

articles.title: Get a DreamCloud mattress for $649 at this early Memorial Day sale ⏰
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering early Memorial Day mattress sales, with discounts up to 60% off and bedding and pillows available for as little as $199 with a queen mattress purchase. The DreamCloud mattresses come with a 365-night home trial and a lifetime warranty, covering defects in materials or workmanship.

articles.title: Get a DreamCloud mattress for $649 at this early Memorial Day sale ⏰
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud mattresses boast a 90% satisfaction rate from 100,000 customer reviews, highlighting their softness, support, and luxurious feel. They also come with a lifetime warranty covering defects and a 365-night trial period, allowing customers to return the mattress for a full refund if unsatisfied.

articles.title: Get a DreamCloud mattress for $649 at this early Memorial Day sale ⏰
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 60% off mattresses and including $599 worth of bedding and pillows for as little as $199 with a queen mattress purchase ahead of Memorial Day 2025. DreamCloud provides a 365-night home trial and a lifetime warranty for their mattresses. Furthermore, Purple is also offering up to $799 off on new mattresses for the same occasion.

articles.title: Get a DreamCloud mattress for $649 at this early Memorial Day sale ⏰
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering significant discounts on its queen-size hybrid mattresses, weighted blankets, and bedding bundles ahead of Memorial Day 2025. The mattresses include a lifetime warranty and a 365-night trial period, reflecting the company's confidence in their durability and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Convenience Elevated: The Best Dressed Chicken Redefines Ready-to-Eat with Chicken Innovations
articles.summary: The Best Dressed Chicken has launched two new products: Crispy Breaded Chicken and Vienna Sausages, designed to offer convenient, high-quality options to consumers. The Crispy Breaded Chicken sold out in just four days after launch, demonstrating strong consumer demand for the new product. This launch signifies the company's commitment to innovation and addressing the evolving needs of the market.

articles.title: Aldi Is Finally Opening Stores in This Popular U.S. City
articles.author: Carissa Chesanek
articles.summary: Aldi has opened two new stores in North Las Vegas and Henderson, Nevada, with a third location set to open on May 15 in Las Vegas. A fourth Las Vegas location is expected by the end of the year as part of Aldi's 5-year national growth strategy to open more than 225 new locations this year and 800 stores by the end of 2028.

articles.title: Nintendo expects to sell 15 million Switch 2 consoles as launch nears
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Switch 2 is scheduled for a global retail release on June 5.

articles.title: Nintendo expects to sell 15 million units of the Switch 2
articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Switch 2 in June. The company expects to sell 15 million units of the console in its current fiscal year.

articles.title: Xiaomi QLED TV FX Pro and Xiaomi 4K TV FX smart TV series launched in India, price starts at Rs 27,999
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Xiaomi QLED TV FX Pro and Xiaomi 4K TV FX smart TV series in India. These TVs offer high-end audio-visual capabilities and intelligent smart features. They are available across Amazon.in, Flipkart, and mi.com.

articles.title: 2025 Samsung Neo QLED, OLED, Frame TVs With Vision AI Features Launched in India: Prices, Features
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 smart TV lineup in India, featuring Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, QLED, and Frame models with new Vision AI technology. The TVs are available for pre-order with cashback offers and zero-down-payment EMI options, alongside localized services like Cloud Gaming Services and Education Hub.

articles.title: Zoho Adds Advanced AI Capabilities to Low-Code Development Platform, Zoho Creator, Enabling  Faster, Easier Business App Creation
articles.summary: Zoho Creator has introduced new features powered by its AI assistant, Zia, which are now available to all users. These enhancements aim to simplify and accelerate app development. While some features are in early access, they are scheduled for general availability in June 2025.

articles.title: LG TV sees takes on Samsung with 50 per cent discount during Amazon's sale
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: LG's 32LQ 32-inch TV is heavily discounted during Amazon's Tech Week, offering Full HD viewing and access to webOS smart platform apps. In comparison, Samsung unveiled its new 2025 range with boosted Vision AI tech, offering trade-in deals up to £1000.

articles.title: Lili's Junk Removal And Dumpster Rental . United States,Georgia, Dallas, Waste Management Company
articles.author: Scrap Monster
articles.summary: Lili's Junk Removal And Dumpster Rental provides junk removal and dumpster rental services.

articles.title: Panasonic's ‘better than ghd and Dyson' folding hair dryer has 58% off
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Amazon has significantly reduced the price of the Panasonic H-NA9J Advanced Folding Hair Dryer, making it available for £79.99 from an original price of £189.99. This hair dryer is designed with Nanoe and Double Mineral tech to reduce hair damage and includes multiple settings and nozzles, including a diffuser.

articles.title: New partnership offers free grocery delivery to thousands of young people across Scotland
articles.author: Caitlin Johnston
articles.summary: Snappy Shopper and Young Scot have partnered to provide free grocery delivery to young people (18+) in Scotland who have a Young Scot National Entitlement Card. This service aims to ease financial pressure by making essential items more accessible through the Snappy Shopper app, which delivers items from local stores.

articles.title: For Android users: How to use Swiggy's new wishlist feature
articles.summary: Swiggy introduced a wishlist feature that allows users to add items or restaurants directly to a wishlist. Users need to update their Swiggy app to the latest version on the Google Play Store to access the wishlist feature. The new feature provides quick access to saved items without repeated searches.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' £34 summer dress is 'perfect in every way'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next has launched the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress, retailing for £34 and available in white, navy, lilac, or black. The dress is made from a comfortable cotton-blend fabric with a textured design and adjustable straps. Customer reviews are mixed, with some praising its comfort and flattering fit, while others note sizing issues.

articles.title: Next's 'beautiful' £34 maxi dress is 'perfect for holidays'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next introduced the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress, retailing at £34, available in four colors and sizes six through 22. The dress features a relaxed fit, cotton-blend fabric, textured detailing, a rounded collar, and adjustable shoulder straps. Customer reviews are overwhelmingly positive regarding the dress's comfort and style.

articles.title: 首个'北京礼物'咖啡社交概念店正式开业
articles.summary: KFC's KCOFFEE Cafe, in collaboration with 'Beijing Gifts', has launched its first global 'Beijing Gifts' coffee social concept store in Beijing on April 29. This 1000th store of KCOFFEE Cafe in China features 'coffee + culture + social' consumption scenario, integrating traditional culture with coffee and showcasing 'Beijing Gifts' cultural and creative products, along with KFC food and KPRO healthy meals.

articles.title: 漢王科技發佈手寫電紙本N10二代：搭載自研天地大模型，售價2499元
articles.author: 新浪網
org: 機器之心報導編輯：蛋醬、張倩時隔兩月，
articles.summary: Hanvon launched the N10 second generation e-reader, featuring an upgraded processor, faster screen refresh, and an integrated AI assistant. The new model includes the Hanvon's self-developed Tiandi large model, DeepSeek and Tongyi Qianwen models and features improved AI capabilities, enhanced microphone array for speech recognition and built in application market.

articles.title: NielsenIQ Expands NIQ Product Insights, Enabling Retailers and Brands to Better Navigate Global Challenges from Tariffs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NielsenIQ (NIQ) has announced the global expansion of NIQ Product Insights (NPI), a solution providing detailed product attributes to CPG and retail enterprises. NPI is expanding to 25 additional markets in Western Europe, Eastern Europe, the Middle East, and Latin America throughout 2025 and 2026. The solution offers 27,000+ structured product attributes per SKU using AI technology.

articles.title: Samsung Launches New Neo QLED, OLED And Frame TVs: Check Price In India, Features, Availability And More
articles.author: TN Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung launched its 2025 television lineup in India, featuring Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, QLED, and The Frame models. The new TVs incorporate Samsung Vision AI to enhance picture and sound, and are powered by NQ8 AI Gen 3 or NQ4 AI Gen 3 processors. Pre-orders are now available with promotional offers, including complimentary soundbars and cashback.

articles.title: First European Performance-Focused Skechers Store Opens in Belgium
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Skechers has opened a new performance store in Ghent, Europe, exporting its innovative retail format. The store offers consumers the latest Skechers products, including tech performance footwear and lifestyle innovations like Skechers Hands Free Slip-ins®. This expansion aims to provide an engaging shopping experience with a complete product line in Europe.

articles.title: Next's 'stunning' £34 dress is 'flattering' and 'doesn't crease'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next has introduced the Textured Jersey Maxi Dress, priced at £34 and available in four shades (white, navy, lilac, or black) and sizes 6-22. The dress, made with cotton-blend fabric, features a textured detail, rounded collar, and adjustable shoulder straps, earning positive reviews for its comfort and style.

articles.title: Samsung to launch Galaxy S25 Edge worldwide on May 13: Prices and features we can expect
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Samsung announced the launch of the Galaxy S25 Edge. The launch event will take place on May 13th at 5am.

articles.title: WATCH: HONOR Magic7 Pro unboxing, impressions
articles.author: Angelo Gonzales
articles.summary: HONOR released the HONOR Magic7 Pro, a flagship phone, on April 11. The phone is priced at 60,000 pesos.

articles.title: Expandi Group Awarded Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Global Competitive Strategy Leadership Award for Democratizing Account-Based Marketing with Scalable, High-ROI Solutions
articles.author: Frost
articles.summary: Expandi provides ABM solutions through a flexible and modular platform. This platform is tailored for global small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), delivering personalized marketing experiences at scale.

articles.title: First European Performance-Focused Skechers Store Opens in Belgium
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Skechers has expanded its retail presence by opening a new performance store in Ghent, Europe. The store features the latest Skechers products, including tech performance footwear and Skechers Hands Free Slip-ins. This expansion follows the opening of Skechers' first performance store in Canada.

articles.title: Samsung to launch ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge on 13 May
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will launch the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone on May 13 in South Korea. The Galaxy S25 Edge will be an ultra-slim model, with a thickness of 5.8 mm. It will be positioned between the Galaxy S25 Plus and Ultra models.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms Galaxy S25 Edge Launch on May 12 with Major Promises
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new slim flagship phone, the Galaxy S25 Edge, at a virtual event on May 12th. The phone features a 200-megapixel camera and aims to combine flagship performance with portability, potentially competing with Apple's rumored iPhone 17 Air. Samsung US is already offering a $50 reservation credit.

articles.title: Amazon says its new Vulcan robot isn't 'numb or dumb,' designed to work like humans
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Vulcan, a new robot for its fulfillment centers, equipped with a sense of touch, revealed at the Delivering the Future event in Germany. Vulcan's ability to sense and manipulate objects is transforming Amazon's operations by making employees' jobs safer and customer orders more efficient, and it is creating new job categories within the company.

articles.title: If You Are A Silly Little Spring Goblin, Allow Me To Tempt You With These 29 Quirky Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new products available for purchase, ranging from the NeeDoh sensory fidget toy by Schylling and a Peeps-themed mini waffle maker to a tennis-inspired "Matchpoint" candle by Otherland and Moodmatcher color-changing lipstick. It also features new items such as a crochet headphone sprout by High Hooks and a "Normal Gets You Nowhere" digital download by Baroo Bloom.

articles.title: motorola edge 60 pro goes on sale at Rs. 29,999 featuring true flagship grade AI experience & segment's only 50MP + 50MP+ 50X AI camera system
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 Pro smartphone in India, featuring advanced AI capabilities, a 50MP camera system, and a 1.5K True Colour Quad-Curved display. The phone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme chipset and boasts a 6000mAh battery with fast charging. It is available in two storage configurations and three color variants, with sales commencing on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores across India with the starting price of INR 29,999.

articles.title: Using AI to transform value of customer feedback
articles.author: Olive Keogh
articles.summary: HappyPath Labs is launching Fizz, a SaaS analytics and quality assurance platform, this month. Fizz utilizes AI to process customer feedback, providing insights into customer sentiment, agent performance, and business trends. The platform aims to disrupt the market by offering a holistic, integrated solution that scales to meet the needs of both small businesses and large enterprises.

articles.title: Amazon Says New Warehouse Robot Can 'Feel' Items, But Won't Replace Workers
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Vulcan, a new warehouse robot with a sense of touch, at an event in Germany. This robot can handle items previously only managed by humans.

articles.title: Honda Elevate, City, City e:HEV and second-gen Amaze get benefits up to  ₹76,100 in May
articles.author: HT Auto Desk
articles.summary: Honda is offering discounts of up to ₹ 57,200 on the second-generation Amaze. The new Honda Amaze comes with corporate discounts and special offers for existing Honda customers, alongside EMIs starting at ₹ 1,111 per lakh. The latest generation features a 1.2-litre engine producing 89 bhp and 110 Nm torque.

articles.title: Jia He Presents an Exquisite Selection of Zongzi Rice Dumplings for the Dragon Boat Festival
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Jia He Chinese Restaurant and Jia He Grand are launching a new collection of handcrafted zongzi for the Dragon Boat Festival, available from May 1st to May 31st, 2025. The menu includes options like the Signature X.O. Roasted Meat Dumpling, Traditional Roast Meat Dumpling, and Vegetarian Butterfly Blue Pea Flower Nonya Dumpling, along with exclusive combination sets.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A56 review: Mid-range phones get a boost
articles.author: Ciara O'Brien
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Galaxy A56, a mid-range smartphone featuring an OLED screen, a 50MP wide-angle camera, and AI-powered photo editing. The A56 has a premium design, a 120Hz refresh rate screen and is available with 256GB of capacity and 8GB of RAM, but lacks wireless charging.

articles.title: McDonald's expands chicken menu with McCrispy launch
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: McDonald's South Africa has launched the McCrispy, a chicken burger, to enhance its position in the chicken market. This new offering features South African-raised chicken breast, a crispy fillet, lettuce, and lemon-pepper sauce on a potato bun, available at McDonald's locations nationwide.

articles.title: Lose 3kg in 12 Weeks – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung (NOZ) introduced 'NOZ Plus,' a subscription service that offers access to articles and a news app. The service provides two subscription options: a monthly subscription with a free trial month followed by a charge of €14.95 per month, and an annual subscription offering a 30% saving.

articles.title: Kia Clavis MPV India launch Live Updates: Price, features, design changes and more
articles.summary: Kia launched the all-new Clavis, positioned above the Carens, offering an upscale alternative with a bold exterior, refreshed cabin, enhanced tech, and improved safety. Official bookings are opening alongside the launch, with customer deliveries expected soon after.

articles.title: Google unveils AI Max to improve online visibility
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: Google announced the global beta rollout of AI Max, a new upgrade to its Search Ads platform. Powered by Google's Gemini technology, AI Max offers features like search term matching and dynamic text customization to enhance advertising efficiency and connect businesses with potential customers. Early adopters have seen a 14 per cent increase in conversions with similar costs.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launch confirmed for May 13- Know what's coming
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Galaxy S25 Edge globally on May 13, 2025, at the 'Beyond Slim event'. The smartphone features a 200MP wide lens, Galaxy AI features, and is available for pre-reservation in the US with a $50 Samsung credit. The Galaxy S25 Edge is expected to be a slim smartphone with an expected thickness of just 5.84mm.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launch Date Announced – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung plans to unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge at a virtual Unpacked event on May 12th, highlighting its slim design and flagship features like a 200-megapixel camera. It aims to offer premium performance in a portable package, potentially revitalizing the mobile industry by attracting new customers with its innovative combination of portability, performance, and premium design.

articles.title: May We All Aspire To Be As Useful As These 37 Tiny Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new and innovative products. The Pink Stuff introduced "Sqeezy" sponge set, while Dr. Scholl's launched Roll-On Foot Pain Relief Liquid. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener and Dae launched Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand. Glossmetics also launched Lychee Overnight Lip Mask and L'Oréal Paris released a BB Cream. Additionally, Oxo released a new compact Brew Rapid Brewer and Naked Sundays has a new CabanaClear SPF 50 Water Gel Serum.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge to launch on May 13: Here's what to expect from the upcoming Galaxy S-series smartphone
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone on May 13th, featuring a 200MP rear camera and mobile AI for enhanced photography. The phone is expected to have a 6.65-inch AMOLED display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, 12GB of RAM, and a dual-camera setup with a 200MP primary sensor.

articles.title: Virgin Australia serves up classic pub favourite in refreshed winter menu
articles.summary: Virgin Australia is launching a new winter menu. The menu includes globally-inspired dishes and Aussie favorites for economy and business class. Economy passengers will have options such as beef pie, sausage rolls, spinach and ricotta tortellini and Archie Rose peach gin and soda while business class passengers will have dishes such as chicken parmigiana, blueberry pancake stack, and pulled beef macaroni cheese.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to unveil ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge on May 13
articles.author: Kim Boram
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the new ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone next week, with a launch event scheduled for May 13. The Galaxy S25 Edge is expected to be 5.8 millimeters thick and maintain the same cutting-edge features as the standard S25, including a 200-megapixel camera and integrated AI capabilities.

articles.title: Zoho Adds Advanced AI Capabilities to Low-Code Development Platform, Zoho Creator, Enabling Faster, Easier Business App Creation
articles.author: Media Outreach Newswire
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation has introduced 10 new services and features to Zoho Creator, its low-code application development platform. This includes CoCreator, a new AI assistant powered by Zia, designed to simplify and accelerate app building. The new features are available immediately to all users.

articles.title: Is the Galaxy S25 Edge ready for its debut? Samsung sets May 12 for virtual Galaxy Unpacked
articles.author: Jacob Krol
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the new Galaxy S25 Edge at a virtual Galaxy Unpacked event on May 12, 2025. The Galaxy S25 Edge features an ultra-thin design and a 200MP wide lens. The event will be streamed live on Samsung's website and YouTube.

articles.title: Ryanair Prime: Over 25,000 passengers have signed up, but there are twists and turns in the T&Cs
articles.author: Pól Ó Conghaile
articles.summary: Ryanair introduced its Prime 'subscriber discount' scheme, offering discounted rates to subscribers.

articles.title: Zoho Adds Advanced AI Capabilities to Low-Code Development Platform, Zoho Creator, Enabling Faster, Easier Business App Creation
articles.author: Zoho Corporation
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation has launched 10 new AI-powered services and features within Zoho Creator, its low-code application development platform. These include CoCreator, an AI assistant that simplifies app building, and AI Skills, which enable businesses to build apps with specialized AI functionalities. The new features aim to speed up app development and are available to all users, with AI Skills set for general availability in June 2025.

articles.title: Zoho Adds Advanced AI Capabilities to Low-Code Development Platform, Zoho Creator, Enabling  Faster, Easier Business App Creation
articles.author: Media Out Reach Newswire
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation has launched 10 new AI-powered services and features within Zoho Creator, its low-code application development platform. This includes CoCreator, a new AI assistant powered by Zia, designed to simplify and accelerate app building. The new features are available immediately to all Zoho Creator users.

articles.title: PubMatic Launches AI-Powered Platform for Media Buyers
articles.author: News Team
articles.summary: PubMatic has launched an upgraded suite of AI-powered solutions for media buyers. The new buyer-facing platform integrates generative AI with proprietary supply-side intelligence, encompassing audience and inventory discovery, forecasting, curation, activation, and performance optimization. The platform is currently in beta testing with key partners, including GroupM.

articles.title: Zoho Launches App To Support Business Owners
articles.author: Abolaji Adebayo
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation has launched new services and features within its Zoho Creator platform, including an AI assistant named CoCreator powered by Zia. The company also introduced the Idea-to-App Generation feature, which uses ZohoAI or OpenAI to develop applications from text or voice prompts. These new AI capabilities aim to simplify and accelerate app development.

articles.title: Artificial intelligence (AI) startup Anthropic announced on the 7th (local time) that it will introd..
articles.author: Wonho-seop
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched a new Claude API that incorporates real-time web search functionality. This allows developers to build Claude-based applications that can search for up-to-date information. Additionally, this web search function has been integrated into Claude Code, a code-assisted AI tool currently in a research beta phase.

articles.title: Drone deliveries expand across North Texas with Walmart, more
articles.author: Diana Zoga
articles.summary: Walmart partners with Zipline and Wing to offer drone delivery services, expanding to multiple locations in North Texas. Zipline's Platform 2 drones can carry up to eight pounds, while Wing anticipates launching a new drone capable of carrying five pounds and delivers from 18 Walmart stores and two DoorDash locations. Flytrex plans to announce two new North Texas delivery zones, and Amazon is in early planning stages to possibly bring Prime Air service to Richardson.

articles.title: Hole in One: Breaking Down the H&H Bagel
articles.summary: H&H Bagels launched a new spicy scallion cream cheese on April 4, available both online and in stores. This product is a seasonal spread made with a blend of chili peppers. H&H Bagels is offering a 10% discount on all nationwide shipping for Mother's Day.

articles.title: Samsung confirms major camera spec for Galaxy S25 Edge before launch - and a free ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge, a lighter, ultra-thin handset, is anticipated to launch and reveal the market's position on this type of design before the iPhone 17 Air release.

articles.title: 37 Products You'll Feel Zero Guilt Buying For Yourself Because They're Actually Super Practical
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. E.l.f. launched Hydrating Core Lip Shine in "Ecstatic" shade and Glossmetics introduced Lychee Overnight Lip Mask. Oxo released a compact Brew Rapid Brewer for quicker cold brew. Ninja launched portable Crispi Air Fryer. Naked Sundays introduced CabanaClear SPF 50 Water Gel Serum, and Medicube introduced Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer.

articles.title: Netflix unveils revamped homepage and app with OpenAI-powered search tool
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Netflix is launching a revamped homepage and updated mobile experience. These updates include an AI search tool and a TikTok-style vertical video feed. The new features offer more visible shortcuts and real-time content recommendations.

articles.title: SK Networks charts bold AI vision
articles.author: system
articles.summary: SK Networks launched a new brand, NamuhX, last month. NamuhX aims to promote wellness through robotics.

articles.title: Zoho Adds Advanced AI Capabilities to Low-Code Development Platform, Zoho Creator, Enabling Faster, Easier Business App Creation
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Zoho is adding advanced AI capabilities to its low-code development platform, Zoho Creator. This enhancement aims to enable faster and easier business app creation. Since its introduction in 2006, Zoho Creator has focused on simplifying app development.

articles.title: Amazon says its new Vulcan robot isn't 'numb or dumb,' designed to work like humans
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Vulcan, a new robot for its fulfillment centers. Amazon describes Vulcan as its first robot with a sense of touch and revealed it during the Delivering the Future event in Germany. Vulcan has helped in creating new job categories.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms Galaxy S25 Edge Launch: How To Watch
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone on May 12th. The phone features AI capabilities, a slim design, a 200-megapixel wide lens with Galaxy AI, and aims to deliver a powerful and portable experience.

articles.title: How Small Teams Fuel Big Innovation In Consumer Goods
articles.author: Stephen Wunker
articles.summary: Nestle utilizes a small, cross-functional Open Innovation accelerator, located outside its headquarters, to develop new offerings like premium chocolate experiences. Mondelez International's SnackFutures venture hub collaborates with external partners, launching new brands such as Dirt Kitchen, which are later transitioned into the main business for scaling.

articles.title: Yellowfin Launches AI-Powered Natural Language Query (AI NLQ) in Version 9.15, Enhancing Self-Service Business Intelligence
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Yellowfin released Yellowfin 9.15. Yellowfin 9.15 features AI-enabled Natural Language Query (AI NLQ). This update enhances self-service data analysis capabilities.

articles.title: 5 Things You Should Know About The Kia EV3
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The article focuses on providing key information for potential customers before ordering the Kia EV3. This suggests the Kia EV3 is either a new or updated product.

articles.title: I Tried One of CNET's Best Robot Vacuums at My Messy Home
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The Dreame X50 robot vacuum underwent CNET lab testing. It is being evaluated for its ability to handle everyday household messes in homes with teenagers and pets.

articles.title: In The Mail: Big Max Dri Lite Prime Cart Bag
articles.author: Golf Blogger
articles.summary: Big Max has a new Dri Lite Prime Cart Bag available. The Big Max Dri Lite Prime Cart Bag arrived for review.

articles.title: Whoop unveils two brand new wearables, but their best features are hidden behind a paywall
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Whoop introduced Whoop 5.0 and Whoop MG. Whoop also launched three new subscription tiers.

articles.title: New supermarket that's 'like Tesco but with Amazon Prime' to open in UK
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A new supermarket is planned to be launched across the UK by the end of the year. This supermarket aims to provide a more convenient shopping experience for customers.

articles.title: Netflix goes AI! Can't decide what to watch? OTT streamer's special feature reads your mood, ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Netflix redesigned its app using generative AI. The app now offers conversational, mood-based show suggestions. This update aims to simplify decisions and boost engagement.

articles.title: This is the weirdest Windows tablet you'll see today: a tiny battery, but also Windows ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: SZBOX is launching the S9, a 7-inch Windows 11 tablet. The S9 features high connectivity, strong performance, and a rugged design.

articles.title: Ncell launches first ‘Shop-in-Shop' in Bhairahawa
articles.author: Kantipur Media Group
articles.summary: Ncell launched its first 'Shop-in-Shop' service model in Bhairahawa, in partnership with New Lumbini A 2 Z Mobile. This new facility provides customers with the full range of services available at Ncell Centres, including purchasing new SIM cards, account recharge, and eSIM upgrades. Ncell plans to expand this model nationwide.

articles.title: Gen Z gets its moment in the beauty spotlight
articles.author: Team Indulge
articles.summary: Veena & Kumaravel launched NXTFACE, a new skincare brand aimed at Gen Z. Actress Kayadu Lohar was unveiled as the face of the brand at an event attended by Arun Paul and Shaifali.
